content: pattern written by virginia tullock of fatcatknits © 2011 please feel free to knit for charity or to sell the booties profit or not fine with me please do not print this pattern and sell it please link back to fatcatknits com if selling booties you make with this pattern size- approximately 3-6 months yarn- worsted weight about 1 oz 28 gm these two pairs of booties weigh 3/4 oz so if you have a full oz of worsted you should be good to go needles- set of 5 us 3 3 25 mm double pointed needles gauge- i got 5 sts/in on bottom of purple bootie and 5 25 sts/in on bottom of pink bootie in stockinette gauge is not too critical babies grow quickly
